titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to eliminate the effect of the parental exception to the kidnaping prohibition in cases of kidnapings in violation of valid custody orders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to provide that the parental exception to the prohibition against kidnapping shall not apply in cases of kidnappings in violation of valid custody orders.
